mapper.sql: id AS id, creator AS creator, modifier AS modifier, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modified AS gmtModified, remark AS remark, is_deleted AS isDeleted, sys_user_id AS sysUserId, balance_money AS balanceMoney, freeze_money AS freezeMoney
mapper.select: SELECT a.id,b.username,b.id AS sysUserId FROM cs_account a left join sys_user b on a.sys_user_id = b.id where 1=1 and a.is_deleted = 0 and a.id = #{id}
SELECT a.id,a.balance_money,a.freeze_money FROM cs_account a INNER JOIN sys_user b on a.sys_user_id = b.id where 1=1 and a.is_deleted = 0 and b.id = #{userId}
